name: Izu Dancer
temple_description:
Izu Dancer was considered the originator of the Japanese Kagura dance, 
possessing powerful divine energy. 
After the Great God Amaterasu hid in Amano-Iwato, the world was shrouded in 
darkness. In response, the gods had no choice but to let Izu perform the 
Kagura dance in front of the sacred cave. Her mesmerizing dance lured 
Amaterasu out, restoring light to the world.

active_skills.name: Purging Arrow
active_skills.effect:
Deals 250% P.DMG to 3 enemies in the front row and has a 75% chance 
to inflict [Sunder Armor], reducing their DEF by 60% for 3 rounds.

active_skills.name: Sacred Dance
active_skills.effect:
All teammates enter [Excite] state, increasing self DEF by 50% and 
self ATK by 40% for 3 rounds. 
Has a 75% chance to dispel all debuffs and restore HP equal to 40% of Izu's ATK.
